MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD1 postcode area of Galashiels. We are aware of multiple power cuts in your area today and we apologise for this. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and for those still off supply, we are working on site closely with SGN and hope to restore all remaining power by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:35pm on Friday, 15th January 2021
